Changelog
=========

1.4.1 - released 2008-05-01
---------------------------

- Added an Install.py for Plone 2.5 compatibility
  [newbery]


1.4 - released 2008-04-16
-------------------------

- Switch to using a GenericSetup profile for installation
  [wichert]

- Repackaged as a python egg.
  [wichert]
